page.title: 02POPULATION
page.content: Of all the areas affected by the influx to the island of{'incomers' from outside Orkney,Burness,and this part in particular,has been affected the most.The term 'incomers' is used for those coming from beyond Orkney and there has been a steady growth in their number since the{early '80's},to the extent that over half of the residents come from elsewhere.Most are family groups with middle aged parents who leave the towns in order to 'have a quieter life' and they augment any savings by keeping usually small numbers of livestock.There are 17 under 18's who are all{English}.At 14,children go to school in{Kirkwall. Unless further generations of incomers settle or a job creating industry arrives,Sanday will probably reach the year 2000 with an old or ageing population or a less numerous one.
